name: The miserliness of yorch
description:
The miserliness of yorch

ART BOOK :  https://online.fliphtml5.com/mleyc/spzm/

             There's been a murder on this cruise ship. Let the player catch the murderer. By exploring the ship and investigating the truth from the witnesses and evidence on this boat 

How to play :

1. Click A, D or left, right arrow to walk. 

2. Click mouse to talk to character and see more evidence information.
